product_name: Wilderness Press Day & Section Hikes: Pacific Crest Trail Northern California
long_description: From Agnew Meadows to the Oregon border, Day & Section Hikes: Pacific Crest Trail Northern California helps you navigate the Pacific Crest Trail with 31 day hikes.
